kpi.name: M1008C303

kpi_info.title: FAILED MBLB IFHO DUE TO UE LOST
kpi_info.use: "The number of failed Multi-Band Load Balancing (MBLB) IFHOs due to UE lost. This is a common failure counter for attempt counters M1008C296, M1008C297, M1008C298 and M1008C299. UPDATED: When the UE does not respond anything to the handover command 8intra-RNC case) or CN does not send IU RELEASE COMMAND (inter-RNC case), timer expires in the RNC and the UE is dropped out from Cell_DCH state. The counter is updated also if the UE sends Cell Update.

kpi.kpi_alias: FAILED MBLB IFHO DUE TO UE LOST
